name: Rumble (itch) (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
name_original: Rumble (itch) (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
description:
By Jaime and Jay

Rumble is a 2D top down game where the objective is to survive in a new world by eradicating the slime. Try to find as many diamonds as possible, they're your keys to survival. You only have five lives so be sure you don't waste them. Monsters will be chasing you so survival won't be easy!  

Instructions: Movement is all four arrow keys  To shoot press the X key.
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
